title: Duang Jai Kabot
overview: A rebellion is brewing in one Kingdom. The nobles have to run for their lives. Pasu comes from a military family and is assigned to protect the crown Prince. By chance, he saves Princess Chantra, unaware of her origin. Together, they will have to escape from an angry army and survive in the forest in an attempt to reach the Thai border. After many adventures, the characters will fall in love with each other. But when they have to return, the bitter truth awaits them: the heroine already has a fiance, and the hero's mother tries in every possible way to find a suitable couple for him. Will their love survive? And what is the end to this story full of conspiracy, intrigue and treachery?
